rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: The entrance hall leads into a spacious living area with ample natural light and ventilation. It is designed following Chettinad style aesthetics using traditional elements such as carved wooden doors and stone finishes.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, this room is designed with large windows for natural light and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater with acoustically treated walls and optimized seating layout. Large openings facilitate natural light during the day while ensuring privacy at night.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom & Utility Area
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom designed with necessary fixtures and a utility area for storage. Proper ventilation is ensured.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with traditional Chettinad elements such as stone countertops and wooden accents. Large windows ensure proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with large windows for natural light and ventilation. The room is designed with traditional Chettinad motifs and ample storage.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Designed to be spacious with good ventilation and natural light. Features traditional elements.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious with natural light and ventilation. Complementing the master bedroom's design.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: A quiet study room with large windows for natural light and ventilation. Incorporates traditional elements.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: This area includes storage and service rooms ensuring functionality while keeping the design minimal.

openings.description: Large wooden door designed with traditional Chettinad motifs. Provides ample ventilation and allows for easy access.

openings.location: Multiple locations including living, dining, bedrooms, and kitchen
openings.description: Strategically placed to maximize natural light and cross-ventilation while preserving privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: The master bedroom on the upper level ensures privacy with ample natural light from high-level windows. Traditional design elements are retained.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom 1 (Upper)
rooms.description: Spacious room with natural light and ventilation. The design incorporates Chettinad style detailing.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom 2 (Upper)
rooms.description: Well-ventilated room with ample natural light and traditional design elements.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: An outdoor space providing natural light and fresh air with a view of the surroundings. Features traditional stone and wood finishes.

rooms.name: Study Room (Upper)
rooms.description: Quiet upper level study room with ample natural light. Traditional design elements are integrated.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom (Upper)
rooms.description: Spare bathroom with functional design ensuring natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: A secure, open staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed to ensure easy accessibility.

openings.location: Multiple locations on the upper level
openings.description: Large windows and skylights maximize natural light and promote ventilation. Designed following traditional aesthetics.
